thread.title: Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
thread.title_full: Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza

author: Bicky
title: Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza
text:
"We are currently updating our website and doing maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience." Home » GLOBAL TRAVEL NEWS » Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza Eid Festivities at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza   
With delightful culinary offerings, warm hospitality and incredible room offers, Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza is set to celebrate Eid Al Adha in style to ensure everyone has nothing short of a memorable Eid filled with relaxation, plenty of fun and excitement. 

Whether planning to take family out for a festive lunch or wishing to celebrate Eid with friends, a warm welcome awaits at Zitouni restaurant, with its all-day Eid Brunch Buffet with live cooking stations, oriental desserts, and much more. 

Cap off Eid celebrations with Beymen Café’s sweet feast, as it offers a prime selection of mouth-watering Eid delights throughout all Eid days. Put a sweet ending to the celebrations and indulge in the Lobby Lounge’s extraordinary chocolate buffet. 

What is a holiday without entertainment? Graffiti Bar & Lounge will add some spice to Eid celebrations with fun-filled nights of DJ beats, live entertainment, a singer and a special exhilarating performance of belly dancer Oxana throughout Eid days.
